Docs.param: Reference to the Microsoft.Azure.Management.RecoveryServices.Backup.IRecoveryPointOperations.
Required. Resource group name of your recovery services vault.
Required. Name of your recovery services vault.
Optional. Request header parameters.
Optional. Fabric name of the protected item.
Optional. Name of the container where the protected item belongs to.
Optional. Name of the protected item whose recovery points are to be fetched.
Optional. ID of the recovery point whose details are to be fetched.
Docs.summary: Gets Info for the given recovery point of the given item protected by your Recovery Services Vault as specified by the recovery point ID passed in the arguments.This is an asynchronous operation. To determine whether the backend service has finished processing the request, call the Get Protected Item Operation Result API.
Docs.returns: A single instance of a recovery point response as returned by the service in the list recovery points call.
